movies.title: The Crown Jewels
movies.plot: Fragancia is arrested for the attempted murder of Richard Persson, the son of a powerful factory owner. During the interrogation her amazing and remarkable life story is revealed. We follow her through her impoverished childhood, her adolescence where she meets the great love of her life, ice hockey star Petterson-Jonsson and the lead up to the fatal night where the story begins.
movies.simplePlot: Fragancia is arrested for the attempted murder of Richard Persson, the son of a powerful factory owner. During the interrogation her amazing and remarkable life story is revealed. We follow...

biography.bio: Alicia Vikander is a Swedish actress, dancer and producer. She was born and raised in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden, to Maria Fahl-Vikander, an actress of stage and screen, and Svante Vikander, a psychiatrist. She is of Swedish and one quarter Finnish descent. Alicia began acting as a child in minor stage productions at The Göteborg Opera, and trained as a ballet dancer at the Royal Swedish Ballet School in Stockholm, and the School of American Ballet in New York. She began her professional acting career by appearing in Swedish short films and television series, and first gained recognition in Northern Europe for her role as Josefin Björn-Tegebrandt in the TV drama Second Avenue (2007). Vikander made her feature film debut in Pure (2009), for which she won the Guldbagge Award for Best Actress. She attracted widespread recognition in 2012 for portraying Princess Ekaterina "Kitty" Alexandrovna Shcherbatskaya in Joe Wright's film adaptation of Anna Karenina (2012), and Queen Caroline Mathilde in the acclaimed Danish film A Royal Affair (2012), receiving a BAFTA Rising Star Award nomination for her breakthrough. She went on to star in the 2013 Swedish drama film Hotel (2013)and appeared in the Julian Assange biopic The Fifth Estate (2013) that same year. In 2014 and 2015, Vikander achieved global recognition and acclaim for her roles as activist Vera Brittain in Testament of Youth (2014), an AI in Ex Machina (2014), for which she was nominated for the Golden Globe and BAFTA Award for Best Supporting Actress, and painter Gerda Wegener in The Danish Girl (2015), for which she received the Academy Award and the Screen Actors Guild Award for Best Supporting Actress.
biography.name: Alicia Vikander

biography.bio: Bill Skarsgård was born on August 9, 1990 in Vällingby, Sweden as Bill Istvan Günther Skarsgård. He is an actor, known for Simple Simon (2010), Allegiant (2016) and Hemlock Grove (2013).
biography.name: Bill Skarsgård

biography.bio: Loa Falkman was born on July 24, 1947 in Danderyd, Stockholms län, Sweden as Carl-Johan Falkman. He is an actor, known for Like It Never Was Before (1995), The Crown Jewels (2011) and Åke och hans värld (1984). He has been married to Rosy Falkman since 1978.
biography.name: Loa Falkman

biography.bio: Noah Byström was born on January 30, 1995 in Uppsala, Uppsala län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for The Crown Jewels (2011).
biography.name: Noah Byström

biography.bio: Lars Björn Gustafsson was born in Romelanda, Sweden. He is a Swedish comedian and actor. He is known from TV-shows such as Parlamentet and Stockholm Live. Björn studied at the Calle Flygares Theater School in Stockholm to become an actor. He has among other things been in the Swedish movie Beck - Flickan i jordkällaren. But before his debut as an actor, he had already debuted in 2005 as a stand-up comedian at Bungy Comedy, a Swedish club for stand-up beginners. In 2006, he enrolled at Standup Star, a stand-up school, where among others, Özz Nûjen and Jakob Öqvist, two of the most well-known comedians in Sweden, have attended.
biography.name: Björn Gustafsson

biography.bio: Jonatan Bökman was born on April 13, 1995 in Nynäshamn, Stockholms län, Sweden as Jonatan Bo Henrik Bökman. He is an actor and writer, known for L'Hypnotiseur (2012), The Crown Jewels (2011) and Gamens öga (2014).
biography.name: Jonatan Bökman

biography.bio: Amanda Junegren is an actress, known for The Crown Jewels (2011).
biography.name: Amanda Junegren

biography.bio: Michalis Koutsogiannakis was born on November 22, 1959 in Crete, Greece. He is an actor, known for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009), The Girl Who Played with Fire (2009) and Un pays idéal (2000).
biography.name: Michalis Koutsogiannakis

biography.bio: Jesper Lindberger is an actor, known for The Crown Jewels (2011).
biography.name: Jesper Lindberger

biography.bio: Sara Lindh is an actress, known for Dansa med dvärgar (2003), Victor (1998) and The Invisible (2002).
biography.name: Sara Lindh

biography.bio: Louise Radon is an actress, known for The Crown Jewels (2011).
biography.name: Louise Radon

biography.bio: Edvin Ryding is an actor, known for A la poursuite du Roi Plumes (2014), The Crown Jewels (2011) and Annika Bengtzon: Crime Reporter (2012).
biography.name: Edvin Ryding

biography.bio: Michael Segerström was born on May 20, 1944 in Lund, Skåne län, Sweden as Karl Kristian Mikael Segerström. He is an actor and writer, known for Darling (2007), Åsa-Nisse - Wälkom to Knohult (2011) and På kurs med Kurt (1981).
biography.name: Michael Segerström

biography.bio: Josefine Högfelt Öijer is an actress, known for Josefines Himmel (2012) and The Crown Jewels (2011).
biography.name: Josefine Högfelt Öijer

biography.bio: Kjell Wilhelmsen was born on March 2, 1967 in Göteborg, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Almost Elvis (2009), Johan Falk: Operation Näktergal (2009) and Balls (2010).
biography.name: Kjell Wilhelmsen
